Package org.cougaar.lib.web.arch

This package contains the Cougaar support classes for the ServletService loaded by the RootServletServiceComponent.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ServletRegistry A table of servlets.
 

Package org.cougaar.lib.web.arch Description

This package contains the Cougaar support classes for the ServletService loaded by the RootServletServiceComponent.

The "arch" package defines generic APIs and support classes for the org.cougaar.lib.web.arch.server.ServletEngine and "root/leaf" servlets. In Cougaar, the "root" is the node-level servlet that forwards "/$" requests to local agents or redirects the client to the appropriate remote host, and the "leaf" is the per-agent servlet that forwards requests to that agent's servlets. For example, the path "/$x/y" is received by the org.cougaar.lib.web.arch.server.ServletEngine's "gateway" and passed to the RootServlet, which sees the "/$x" and forwards to local agent "x"'s LeafServlet, which forwards to that agent's "/y" servlet.

The "arch" only depends upon "javax.servlet.*"; all the service details and org.cougaar.lib.web.arch.server.ServletEngine implementation are in org.cougaar.lib.web.service.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
